type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.CodeNarcExtension
type.description:
Configuration options for the CodeNarc plugin.
@see CodeNarc

method.name: getConfig
method.description: The CodeNarc configuration to use. Replaces the configFile property. @since 2.2

method.name: getConfigFile
method.description: The CodeNarc configuration file to use.

method.name: getMaxPriority1Violations
method.description: The maximum number of priority 1 violations allowed before failing the build.

method.name: getMaxPriority2Violations
method.description: The maximum number of priority 2 violations allowed before failing the build.

method.name: getMaxPriority3Violations
method.description: The maximum number of priority 3 violations allowed before failing the build.

method.name: getReportFormat
method.description: The format type of the CodeNarc report. One of <tt>html</tt>, <tt>xml</tt>, <tt>text</tt>, <tt>console</tt>.

method.name: setConfigFile
method.description: The CodeNarc configuration file to use.

property.name: config
property.description: The CodeNarc configuration to use. Replaces the configFile property. @since 2.2

property.name: configFile
property.description: The CodeNarc configuration file to use.

property.name: maxPriority1Violations
property.description: The maximum number of priority 1 violations allowed before failing the build.

property.name: maxPriority2Violations
property.description: The maximum number of priority 2 violations allowed before failing the build.

property.name: maxPriority3Violations
property.description: The maximum number of priority 3 violations allowed before failing the build.

property.name: reportFormat
property.description: The format type of the CodeNarc report. One of <tt>html</tt>, <tt>xml</tt>, <tt>text</tt>, <tt>console</tt>.
